name: Creation
description: The pure force of origination and initiative. Like heaven generating existence, this represents the primary creative impulse that initiates all manifestation.

lines_in_transition.6: Transcendent Dragon: Vision beyond convention; Create with wisdom
lines_in_transition.5: Flying Dragon: Creation at its peak; Act with confidence
lines_in_transition.4: Leaping Dragon: Growing power; Prepare for emergence
lines_in_transition.3: Active Dragon: Creative engagement; Work diligently
lines_in_transition.2: Dragon in Fields: Building strength; Gather resources
lines_in_transition.1: Hidden Dragon: Potential stirring; Begin carefully

tholonic_analysis.negotiation: The hexagram represents pure creative force, with both trigrams being Qian/Heaven. This creates unimpeded generative power.
tholonic_analysis.limitation: Structure is provided by heaven above and below, indicating that creation follows cosmic principles. The doubled heaven suggests amplified creative force.
tholonic_analysis.contribution: This pattern contributes to evolution by initiating new forms. It shows how consciousness manifests reality through directed will.
tholonic_analysis.significance_in_thologram: In the tholonic system, this hexagram represents pure creative consciousness. It demonstrates how awareness generates existence through focused intention.

no_moving_lines: When no lines are changing, focus on steady creation. Success comes through persistent generation rather than forced manifestation.
all_moving_lines: A complete transformation in how creation functions is indicated. Old patterns of manifestation must give way to new forms of generation. Ensure wisdom guides power while embracing change.
